page.title: 12SMALL HOLDING SPINNEYFORD
page.content: BROOK FARM, BRAILSFORD. 4 acres. Mr & Mrs Ridgard came here in 1944 & stayed on in retirement. They have created a beautiful garden on both sides of the lane, 2 vegetable gardens, paths thro- ugh flower beds to brook. Grow most trees & plants from seeds or cuttings using a greenhouse. Keep hens. Hobbies are walking, gardening, making wine from comfrey, hawthorn, elderflower etc. They have electricity, deep free- zer, use microwave oven. Mrs Ridgard sews & knits in winter. Is a member of Osmaston W.I. & recently learned the craft of goose egg decoration. Organic gardening practised to conserve small animals & fish. There is hunting, cubbing & beagling. Falconer flies an African eagle in the area. Cabin & sitting out places created near brook where sun reaches. Trout in brook.
